properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Crockett, TN; Dyer, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 6 at 9:20AM CST until January 10 at 12:19PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the S.F. of the Forked Deer River...

S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls affecting Crockett...Dyer
and Lauderdale Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* from Monday January 06 until Friday January 10.
* At 09 AM Monday the stage was 10.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river has crested and will gradually start to fall.
* At 10.5 feet...Flooding on agriculture land near the river.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
